questions.question: Which point of the rotating link in elliptical trammel traces a circular path?

answers.c: both mid point and end poin
answers.d: neither mid point nor end point

questions.question: The length of rotating link in elliptical trammel is equal to ?

answers.a: sum of major axis and minor axis
answers.b: double of sum of major axis and minor axis
answers.c: half of sum of major axis and minor axis

questions.question: End point of rotating link of elliptical trammel travels in a straight line
A point on the line obtained by extending the rotating link of elliptical trammel also traces an ellipse
Ellipse traced by an elliptical trammel has major axis 180mm and minor axis 100mm, what is the diameter of the circle that can be drawn without changing the link lengths of the mechanism
